title: 6 6 6 "The Beast Breaker""Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!"Transliteration: "Zettai Zetsumei! Mōjūtsukai Mōji VS Rufi!" (Japanese:絶体絶命!猛獣使いモージvsルフィ!) Shigeyasu Yamauchi Mitsuru Shimada 112.3 December 29, 1999(1999-12-29)[15] October 23, 2004[16]
transformers_text:
6 6 6 "The Beast Breaker""Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy!"Transliteration: "Zettai Zetsumei! Mōjūtsukai Mōji VS Rufi!" (Japanese:絶体絶命!猛獣使いモージvsルフィ!) Shigeyasu Yamauchi Mitsuru Shimada 112.3 December 29, 1999(1999-12-29)[15] October 23, 2004[16]

Still trapped in the cage, Luffy meets a small dog named Chouchou guarding his master's store, despite knowing that his owner is dead. Mohji the Beast Tamer's lion, Ritchie, inadvertently breaks Luffy's cage open, and sends him flying. Chouchou tries to protect the store, but is no match for the much stronger Ritchie, and Mohji burns the store down. Angered by Mohji destroying what the dog finds precious, Luffy mercilessly punches him out. Moved by Luffy's concern for the dog, Nami agrees to work with Luffy for the time being.
